metadata.name: Console CodePage Lookup Via CHCP
metadata.comment: Detects use of chcp to look up the system locale value as part of host discovery

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' -c ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' –c ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' —c ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' ―c ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' -r ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' –r ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' —r ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' ―r ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' -k ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' –k ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' —k ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' ―k '))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\chcp.com')) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('chcp')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('chcp ')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('chcp  '))))

output.summary: Detects use of chcp to look up the system locale value as part of host discovery

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. During Anaconda update the 'conda.exe' process will eventually execution the 'chcp' command. 2. Discord was seen using chcp to look up code pages References: https://thedfirreport.com/2022/04/04/stolen-images-campaign-ends-in-conti-ransomware/, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/chcp
